Conversion Options Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»LLB Manager, select an LLB, and click the Convert Directories and LLBs button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to convert an existing LLB to a directory.

This dialog box includes the following components.

  • LLBs to convert to directories—Displays the LLB you selected to convert to a directory.
  • Directory name—Provides options for creating the directory name.
  • Original LLB—Provides options for handling the original library after conversion.
